AMD_20250924_013743_0000.current_text: The Congress shall make no law...
AMD_20250924_013743_0000.proposed_text: The Congress shall make no law restricting peaceful assembly...
AMD_20250924_013743_0000.rationale: We need to strengthen the right to peaceful assembly in our current political climate.

comments.comment_text: I strongly support this amendment as it clarifies an important constitutional right.
